reviewText: When you review the list of outstanding actors, you think, "This has got to be, if not great, at least a good movie."  Not so!  Don't be fooled.  This thing has no story--it's just a series of compartmentalized scenes edited together, apparently by committee.  The technical effects, depicting the RAF in action, were adequate for that day, but this could not possible redeem an otherwise lost cause.  The real story of "The Battle of Britain" deserves much better than this.
